sentences.en: If the jamb - mine isn't exploited, the economic benefit will go down rapidly.
sentences.cn: 如果不采矿柱矿山经济效益将急剧滑坡.

sentences.en: Many men including Jamb volunteered to help.
sentences.cn: 许多人包括杰可伯都自愿帮忙.

sentences.en: Outer facing of panel and narrow door jamb hairline stainless steel on all floors, hard aluminium.
sentences.cn: 各层门扇外表和小门套均为发纹不锈钢, 硬质铝地坎.

sentences.en: They would linger at the jamb of the door.
sentences.cn: 他们就在门旁侧壁那呆着不走.

trans.tran_en: A jamb is a post that forms the side or upright part of a door frame or window frame
